entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
